message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value that we believe could significantly benefit you. We're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special introductory price of $500000. We're confident this investment will yield substantial returns and satisfaction for you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on this product, $500000 is a bit outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $800000 for it, reflecting the value I see in its potential benefits.  Let me know if you're open to discussing this further.

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to work towards a mutually beneficial agreement. In light of your offer, I am proposing a counteroffer of $900000. This reflects a compromise that acknowledges the value you see in the product while also allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to your response and hope we can reach an arrangement that satisfies both parties.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $900000 is still a bit high for me.  However, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $850000.  This would be a fair price that allows us both to get a good deal.  Let me know if you're open to this compromise.
